title: Inspirefest 2017
description: Inspirefest is a truly unique international festival of technology, science, design and the arts, which also happens to place diversity and inclusion at its heart.

title: Girls in Tech Dublin - Design Thinking in Global Payments
description: Girls in Tech Dublin is back, hosted by Realex Payments. Come, mingle, meet people, listen learn, and get invovled! Drinks and appetisers will be served.

title: Women Who Code, Dublin - Sharing Scala Stories @ Workday
description: We will be hosting our next meet up at Workday Dublin HQ. This Month’s topic is focused on sharing our amazing stories around functional programming and scala.

title: PyLadies Dublin - May Meetup
description: Joanna Moran will be giving a 10 minute talk about 'AI Landscape in Ireland and EU'. Location and 2nd speaker TBC.

title: Coding Grace Wexford - HTML5 session
description: For those who wish to join and learn the basics the EASY way.

title: WITS - The Entrepreneurship Rollercoaster
description: Cristina Luminea will bring you through the experience of being an entrepreneur from the very beginnings, overcoming the fear of quitting your job and starting up to the point of having to make the decision of closing down.

title: WITS - Unconscious Bias
description: Ita O’Sullivan is Startup Community Manager in Bank of Ireland. She has previously worked as Design and Deployment Lead in Google. She is passionate about diversity and inclusion in startups.

title: OWASP & Women Who Code: An evening of Cyber Security with the Pros
description: This joint OWASP and WWCode meetup will be focusing on diversity in the cyber security community, how to get into cyber security, and why you should care.

title: WWCode & Your job search
description: Women Who Code are here to help you land the job of your dreams. This event will provide you with the knowledge you need to secure interviews and ace them.

title: WWCode & Your job search
description: The event will be a great chance to meet new people, learn from one another, and empower each other to think big every day!

title: Django Girls Belfast
description: We want women to experience what it is like to code and work with technology. Our goal is to create a safe environment where women can explore technology.

title: Lovelace Space - Stitch with Hoopla
description: Hoopla uses an AI system to design embroidery sampler patterns that are then hand-stitched. Learn how to hand-stich AI sampler patterns to take home with you.

title: Google Women Techmakers Belfast Summit 2017
description: Women Techmakers is Google’s brand and global programme for women in technology. It is an initiative that aims to raise awareness of innovative female leaders in technology and inspire others to join the field.
